page.title: 15Family life: dawn to dusk
page.content: In the village of Ellel life goes on as usual. In a country house used many years ago as a coach house, not far from the university lives a family of four. The day starts with breakfast then it's off to work. Both of the children go to different schools but travel by car, while the husband walks as he works at the university and the wife cycles. The husband gets home on an average day at 6 pm while the wife arrives home at 4 pm ready for the children to arrive home from school. To relax after work the wife can go to the university to swim, while the daughter goes to Forton for piano or riding lessons and the son to Lancaster for guitar lessons. They like living there as it is in the country and convenient for the university.
